short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toogle visibilty of Airtable tables inside a base.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Base Table Hider" Chrome extension is your essential tool for managing your Airtable bases with ease and efficiency. This handy extension simplifies your workspace by allowing you to toggle the visibility of tables within your Airtable base, streamlining your workflow and enhancing your data organization.
